meanings.definition: Amusing in an odd or whimsical way.
meanings.sent1: The clown's drollness made everyone giggle at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her drollness jokes always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent3: The drollness of the situation was so unexpected that we couldn't help but laugh.
meanings.sent4: His drollness was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The drollness of the cartoon characters made them unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The quality of being humorous in an unusual or quirky manner.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's drollness captivated the audience throughout the show.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the drollness in his writing style; it's so unique.
meanings.sent3: The drollness of the movie plot kept me entertained from start to finish.
meanings.sent4: Her drollness was a breath of fresh air in the dull office environment.
meanings.sent5: The drollness of the situation lingered in my mind long after the event.
